flavor: Perhaps they created you, perhaps they summoned you, or perhaps they simply found youâ€”however they acquired you, a cabal of arcane scholars treated you as the subject of fascinating study. You might have been on display, or you might have been kept hidden away from everyone except members of the cabal. Were you well treated, or were you locked in a cage? Did some catastrophe befall the scholars, allowing you to escape? Were you the catastrophe?
name: Genasi - Academic Exhibit
